description: Updates the configuration for a Slack channel, such as case update notifications.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: The channel ID in Slack. This ID identifies a channel within a Slack workspace.

parameters.name: notifyOnCaseSeverity
parameters.description: The case severity for a support case that you want to receive notifications. If you specify high or all, at least one of the following parameters must be true: notifyOnAddCorrespondenceToCase notifyOnCreateOrReopenCase notifyOnResolveCase If you specify none, any of the following parameters that you specify in your request must be false: notifyOnAddCorrespondenceToCase notifyOnCreateOrReopenCase notifyOnResolveCase.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The team ID in Slack. This ID uniquely identifies a Slack workspace, such as T012ABCDEFG.

nested_items.name: channelId
nested_items.description: The channel ID in Slack. This ID identifies a channel within a Slack workspace.

nested_items.name: channelName
nested_items.description: The name of the Slack channel that you configure for the Amazon Web Services Support App.

nested_items.name: channelRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that you want to use to perform operations on Amazon Web Services. For more information, see Managing access to the Amazon Web Services Support App in the Amazon Web Services Support User Guide.

nested_items.name: notifyOnAddCorrespondenceToCase
nested_items.description: Whether you want to get notified when a support case has a new correspondence.

nested_items.name: notifyOnCaseSeverity
nested_items.description: The case severity for a support case that you want to receive notifications.

nested_items.name: notifyOnCreateOrReopenCase
nested_items.description: Whether you want to get notified when a support case is created or reopened.

nested_items.name: notifyOnResolveCase
nested_items.description: Whether you want to get notified when a support case is resolved.

nested_items.name: teamId
nested_items.description: The team ID in Slack. This ID uniquely identifies a Slack workspace, such as T012ABCDEFG.
